doc:
Tony Martin (American singer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tony_Martin_(American_singer) 0 Alvin Morris (December 25, 1913 – July 27, 2012), known professionally as Tony Martin, was an American actor and popular singer. His career spanned over seven decades, and he scored dozens of hits between the late-1930s and mid-1950s with songs such as "Walk Hand in Hand", "Stranger in Paradise" and "I Get Ideas". He was married to actress and dancer Cyd Charisse for 60 years, from 1948 until her death in 2008. Alvin_Morris ( December_25_,_1913 – July_27_,_2012 ) , known professionally as Tony_Martin , was an_American_actor and popular_singer . His_career spanned over seven_decades , and he scored dozens of hits between the_late-1930s_and_mid-1950s with songs such_as " Walk_Hand in Hand_" , " Stranger in Paradise " and " I Get Ideas " . He was_married to actress_and_dancer_Cyd_Charisse for 60_years , from 1948 until her_death in 2008 .
